website_summaries.verdict: A solid copper birdbath that's hard-wearing and looks great, too.
pros: Unique iron twig stand is very charming
cons: Some users report bowl can blow off stand in high winds

customer_reviews.title: Very happy -- 4 seasons later
customer_reviews.text: So glad we purchased this birdbath - 4 years ago. Happy to see they are still available. Ours is in great shape. The best thing is it is lightweight and easy to clean. Ceramic and glass birdbaths easily get broken on windy days from falling limbs, etc. This holds up. The patina changes over time, but still looks great. It balances on the unique metal stand so you have to set it just right, but it stays put. If it got knocked off, it wouldn't break. We keep a rock in our birdbaths to give birds a little perch, as you can see in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Beckalina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible construction
customer_reviews.text: Shabby. Either they forgot to weld pieces on or thought using a little orange glue to construct their metal $85 water basins was a great idea. Part was already off when I unpacked it - completely unacceptable. Returned for refund. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a Waterer, not as a Bath
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice-looking bath, even though the "twig" stake is just bent iron...use your imagination and it looks twiggy enough, I suppose. It's easy to put together and surprisingly stable. However, "my" birds will not bathe in it. They will drink from it, but will not bathe, whether because of the slippery sides, the shiny metal, or whatever, I don't know. I had to get a stone bird bath, which they love to bathe in. I kept this one, too, because it looks nice and they do drink from it. But my advice would be to just put the money up front for a good stone bath--won't break in winter and birds prefer the stone surface.
customer_reviews.author: CWP

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this lovely birdbath. It is perfect for our yard, a bit rustic and yet a bit classy. We already have three other birdbath's in the backyard (including a heated version) but wanted something a little nicer for the front yard. I've placed it right by the spigot so it will be easy to fill. I figure a little fresh water everyday is the least I can do for these lovely creatures. Seems very well made and came almost assembled, just one easy piece to move into place. The copper bowl is a good size and sits very stably in the base. I don't expect to have any problems with tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Lots of birds drinking out of it!
customer_reviews.text: In the three months I've had this birdbath, I think I've seen two birds actually bathe in it. But I've seen hundreds of birds stop by to take long sips of water. They all look like they appreciate the nice drink, so I'm very glad I bought this. So are the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: It came way ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty birdbath for the many beautiful cardinals, bluejays, and other birds in my yard. Upon putting it in the Florida sand/soil a part of it snapped off, right under, wear the bird bath sits. The solder didn't hold and the other areas look like they could fall off too. There is no sense in returning it as I'd have to pay for shipping. Not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Conlon

customer_reviews.title: budget bird bath with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: We liked the looks of this and ordered it for our garden renovation. The product is atractive although the bowl does not sit level when the post is perfectly vertical. It also came with a small dent in it. I did not like that this appears to have a plastic coating on the bowl which defeats the purpose of copper. Copper is naturally germicidal and will keep insect larvae and algae under control if it can dissolve into the water. Now I need to dose copper into the bird bath to accomplish this goal...
customer_reviews.author: bblumberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birdbath, I give it a 10 and so do the birds!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this birdbath, and so are the birds! I have other larger birdbaths in my yard, but I needed one to tuck into a bed that sits in the center of a grouping of flowers. it is the right height and width and looks beautiful. I do think for the item it is expensive, but I couldn't find any thing else I liked, and after owning it, I would purchase it again. I have had many birdbaths of all shapes and sizes and this one is very beautifully made, high quality, and looks like it will last a long time. I would highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: E.B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Over Priced, Poor Quality, lacking proper description
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product description is not clear that the copper bath is coated with a toxic finish. It is not raw copper, which is desired by the birds/animals. It also notes, "Ancient Graffiti solid copper birdbath". The copper bath has no "Graffiti" or anything. It is perfectly smooth. The copper also was damaged as shown in my photo. There was a blemish and hole in the toxic copper coating. Based on the cost of the copper bath and stand, this poor quality product is very over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M. Nagano

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I have used this all summer and it still looks great. The birds drink out of it, but rarely bathe in it, so I may need to try a different spot! This is beautiful and the prong stays in the ground even in high winds. I empty it daily to prevent slime and mosquito larvae. I read reviews for hours before spending the extra money this one cost compared to many others.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Copper glows in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful birdbath! The copper glows in the sun. It assembles easily and is stable in the ground even on windy days. My only disappointment has nothing to do with the birdbath itself. Its diameter is too small for floating solar fountains; the slightest breeze blows the spraying water outside of the birdbath, and obviously the fountain mechanism cannot function when the water is gone! So if you're getting a solar fountain, you'll need a birdbath with a considerably wider diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Hauptwerk

customer_reviews.title: I love this birdbath
customer_reviews.text: I love this birdbath! It's beautiful and easy to install. The sender did a good job wrapping it too. It arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Duberliz Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive birdbath, but....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this birdbath, it is very attractive and had a low profile in the back yard. However, we couldn't get the bowl to stay on the top. Water added would help to keep it stable, but when seeing it cocked in the supports one morning, I knew it had to go back. The supports are not stable, especially when we have squirrels as well as birds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a big dent it. As it was packed pretty well, I have to assume it was shipped that way. The coating on it seemed like it was applied very hurriedly. Didn’t look worth the steep price. Very disappointed since this product got rave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice but poorly packed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking fro a bird bath that was functional and not too ornate or cutesy, this fit the bill. Its a little smaller than I expected and the bowl arrived dented. Returned it and promptly received a replacement, also dented. At this point, I'm assuming they are pre-dented at the factory, hence the "Ancient" in the name, or, maybe because they took an "ancient" and bumpy route from India. In any event, its a nice looking bird bath and the dents give it character (not).
customer_reviews.author: H. Zelizer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design undermined by poor manufacture
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived damaged. The welds on the stand are not of good quality and sheer easily. A replacement was sent in very quick time and arrived in tact but like the first order the copper bird bath was not of high quality as there were several imperfections in the copper on both. I kept the second one as the return postage on the first was $67! This could be a reasonable buy if there was an element of quality control applied to the manufacturing process (it is made in India). I do not consider this item to be worth its retail price so would be hesitant to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Daniels

customer_reviews.title: I like it, the birds like it! Easy to assemble, easy to clean, looks lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bird bath. It is shallow enough for the birds; also, I put a few flat stones in the bath to provide more places for the birds to stand while deciding whether to bathe or drink. It was a zip to assemble and stake in my lawn. And it is a zip to refill and clean, the top just comes off of the base like a tray, and is light weight. And for the health of the birds, you should clean your bird bath every couple of days. I can easily carry it to my sink to wash, rinse it and re-fill. Super happy with this purchase. Materials are as stated. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: CFC

customer_reviews.title: Great Birdbath!
customer_reviews.text: Love this birdbath. Wanted something a little different, and this does the trick. Easy to assemble and place in the yard. Came well packed. Fits perfect in small garden.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Dee

customer_reviews.title: not quality
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived well packaged, but the contents are not quality. The copper birdbath is uneven in the coating and even looked damaged on the side of it The pole part did look too brown and not done in a attractive way. Anciet Graffiti Solid copper birdbath with iron twing stake does not look like the photograph.
customer_reviews.author: j.c.

customer_reviews.title: Copper coating comes off after a time with the water
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, the bowl never blows off in high winds. The only thing I was disappointed in was that the copper coating disappeared after just a month inside the bowl where the water is.
customer_reviews.author: shawn starin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much more beautiful than the pictures! The copper patina gloves off a soft glow. Stand is super sturdy and has not been blown off in the 50+ mph gusts we get here in the foothills in Colorado!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. If windy it would have blown away. I returned it for this reason as well as the basin arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: Small but Attractive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome birdbath and easy to take care of. In South Texas we have VERY large grackles and doves. One bath from a grackle and it has to be cleaned and refilled....hopefully the grackles will migrate on and my smaller birds can take a bath. They all drink from it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: Priced little high but you definitely are getting what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 other birdbaths all around my large yard and this one is my wife and grandkids favorite one to watch the birds in.Thinking of purchasing more of this one of same quality.
customer_reviews.author: danny lopez

customer_reviews.title: Truly lovely garden addition tucked under crabapple tree and suet feeder 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Well-made. Birds like, and even perch atop the twigs when I remove plate to refill! Only complaint is volume of packing material used to ship — really over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is beautiful. The copper is lovely and the birds love to bath in it. I like that it is on a narrow stake which is quite sturdy because it is very low profile and does not take up a lot of room in my flower garden. it is functional and a great accent piece that really adds to the garden.
customer_reviews.author: KCT7764

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this. Havent owned it long enough to see how it ages, but it looks great now, is very stable, and the birds like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Roaix

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but did not work out
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful birdbath. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I was very excited to put it in my yard and watch birds to drink and bathe. Unfortunately, none of my backyard birds were able to land on it. Not sure if it's too slippery or there's not a perch for them to balance on, but I watched several of them try to land and they flew away unsuccessfully. Unfortunately, I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Rauschenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bird bath. It looks great in my flower garden near the bird feeder. It was easy to assemble and install.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Bath attached to pedestal makes it hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bath doesn’t come off pedestal so have to take our pedestal to dump and clean
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: At  home in my yard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bird bath to replace a beautiful blue ceramic one that had broken after some years. I didn't think I'd find one I liked as well, but this serene copper one looks as if it just grew in among my plants. The birds love it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I very much like the design and fits well with my backyard
customer_reviews.text: This copper birdbath has been living in my backyard a couple of weeks now. I'm very impressed with the quality, materials and workmanship. I very much like the design and fits well with my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Dave & Allie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful copper bird bath
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and value, my friend loved it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: R. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Missing copper bath.
customer_reviews.text: Did not ship with copper bird bath. Only the stand (stake) was in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy, stout. Like it very much. The copper plate is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and the bowl stays put even in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Love this birdbath. It doesn’t take up a lot of room and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam G7

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath is a very pretty addition to your yard or garden. It is lighweight and the squirrels that hop up into ours cannot knock it over. It is easy to clean and I love the style. It is well worth the money and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Usable but Bent, Dented and Dinged
customer_reviews.text: The birdbath and stand appear to be solidly made. Unfortunately the solid copper basin part of the bird bath arrived dented, bent and dinged. The ratings show that our experience was not unique - that this has happened to other people as well. As it will be placed in a vegetable garden away from public view it is not worth the hassle and expense of returning it. If you order it, be sure to open it carefully to save the packaging in case you need to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without  birdbath dish
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived without the copper birdbath. The only item in the box was the stand for the birdbath. I will call and have them send the birdbath I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to our yard
customer_reviews.text: Like even better in person. Nice addition to our yard.
customer_reviews.author: kkferb

customer_reviews.title: Copper birdbath
customer_reviews.text: The bb is beautiful and looks nice. I was afraid wind would blow away the copper bath so I hot glued it to one of the stems. I just use my hand to swish out the water and any trash before refilling. It has held tight in some really windy weather. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Bowl is great but the twig is fragile
customer_reviews.text: The weld that holds one of the three prongs on broke off easily when my husband pulled on it to move it. We are now trying to figure out how to weld it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Myerberg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice - bought one then ordered another
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful copper birdbath. Easily installed and looks good. Birds are using it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath looks exactly like the photo and is beautiful in my front yard. The copper did not become dull over time which was something I was concerned with when I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love the copper. I ended up using zip ties to hold it down during winter stormy months.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Ancient Graffiti Solid Copper Birdbath with Iron Twig Stake
customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful. The only problem is it blows off the stake on windy days. The solution was to set a small, concrete animal in the center to hold it. I think it would not blow off if it is placed in a protected area of the yard. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a very pretty birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a bird bath that is both beautiful and sturdy. After losing a few other varieties to cold weather...and/or cats and squirrels toppling them over...this one seems to be the answer. For us, this is a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.text: the packaging was ridiculous. you could have fit an adult into the box the birdbath came in. total,waste of cardboard
customer_reviews.author: linda cohen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my sisters birthday, it is absolutely beautiful and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and looks well in flower bed.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I put it in my perennial bed near the patio door. Love to watch the birds bathe and drink from it. It is easy to clean and refill. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: patricia lennon

customer_reviews.title: VERY cheap product!
customer_reviews.text: The finish on this product was awful, it was peeling & bubbling up everywhere. Very light weight & cheaply made. A light wind would blow it right over. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McManus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yard piece
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Blends nicely with surroundings and has a very classy look.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bell

customer_reviews.title: It's on the smallish side
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at but too small plus I think the copper attracts the sun and makes it hot for the birds to rest on while drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: The birds love a little water in the Summer and this bird bath is super easy to refill and keep clean. Durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Noel

customer_reviews.title: It looks cheap...
customer_reviews.text: The bowl was beautiful, decent size in diameter, but the twig base looks very cheap or cheesy... I'd expected a brushed bronze finish and got something that looks like it was spray painted flat brown. All in all, the quality does not match the price. If I were to recommend this bath to someone, I would recommend it for the use in a condominium walkway or entrance path because it has that quaint look.
customer_reviews.author: Kbliss

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small area.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small place. Attractive,easy assembly. Not able to tell durability yet. We will see that in the months ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Came dented
customer_reviews.text: I would say it is just what I wanted for my wife but it came dented and I really did not want to take the time to send it back for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this in my back yard-really pretty in the middle of my flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PARTS MISSING - Quickly replaced
customer_reviews.text: My replacement bird bath arrived complete and quickly. Thank you! The return went very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the yard.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product and well made. I love watching the birds bath/drink from this birdbath. I recommend this products.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Luvs Sun

customer_reviews.title: copper birdbath
customer_reviews.text: I love this birdbath! It is high quality and the post is thick and sturdy. Looks great in the garden and the birds love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bartoldus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. bird bath tray itself was discolored, came dented and cheep. Definately not copper!
customer_reviews.author: suzannne r.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous copper bird bath!
customer_reviews.text: We (and our bird friends) love this! It is getting used every day! It even looks pretty on gray days!
customer_reviews.author: Buff Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed and constructed from quality materials - well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but packaging needs to be improved.
customer_reviews.text: All in all I'm very happy with this birdbath. The frame is nicely put together and the bowl is attractive. The biggest issue, as others have also experienced, is that the bowl arrived slightly damage (couple small dents). The copper is pretty thin (and soft by nature), so it was was easy to push out the dents sufficiently to not be an issue. But the vendor needs to find a better way to package this, as the outer package was in great shape, so the damage was caused by the frame shifting in the box.
customer_reviews.author: VermontGuy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I like the quality. Must keep it in the shade or it will get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: N. Manheimer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it, it's beautiful & very solid for such ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, it's beautiful & very solid for such a portable piece. Some reviews said the packaging wasn't good. Mine was in so many boxes It was like playing with nesting dolls. Very well packaged & in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but dented
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers had mentioned that the copper birdbath was dented when they received it. I assumed (wrongly) that these would be checked before being sent since several people complained about this. Ours arrived in a huge box and it was obvious that it was well packed and was not damaged in shipping. My husband said that it was obvious that the inner box that held the copper birdbath had been repacked, so it should have been replaced before it was sent to us. We decided to keep it because my husband thought he could knock out the dent, and we really liked the design.
customer_reviews.author: mamaox

customer_reviews.title: Unique and timeless
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my wife as a surprise. She loved it so much we ended up getting one for my mom for the following Mother's day.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice copper bowl. Not too big but not too small. Well made; sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dahmer

customer_reviews.title: Due to poor workmanship, the bowl sits crooked on stand due ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is poorly made. The 3rd arm of stand is inserted between the 2 stationary arms. Due to poor workmanship, the bowl sits crooked on stand due to poor construction of 3rd arm. The bowl is dented.Not sure it is really copper. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Collins

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, seems like it will last, birdies love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Petula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: this was a great gift for the father in law, it looks beautiful in there yard, worth the purchase, it is a tad on the small side, but still nice
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking but Birds Dont like?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift but I don't think the birds like the metal.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bird bath ..made very well .. It looks really good in my garden
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I did not have any "ancient graffiti" on my birdbath ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not have any "ancient graffiti" on my birdbath as advertized, but I kept it since sending back was expencive too. Irish
customer_reviews.author: Irish

product_meta.title: Ancient Graffiti Solid Copper Birdbath with Iron Twig Stake
product_meta.description: Size:14.75W x 35HAncient Graffiti solid copper birdbath with iron twig stake. This nature-inspired gift and accessory for your garden is created using natural materials. Handcrafted to create an item that is handsome, built to last and of good value. This item is made using honest materials such as wood, clay, iron, copper, stone and brass. Sure to attract all your favorite birds. Measures 14.75-inch d x 35-inch h. Made from recycled metal products.
feature_bullets: Creates an artistic blending of your style and garden environment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars129 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
